title: Cody Simpson penned a love poem for Miley Cyrus and we are deceased
text:
The two have not been shy about their relationship (Picture: Instagram)

The budding romance between Cody Simpson and Miley Cyrus has just gone to another level with the Australian singer penning her a love poem.

After a very public start, when Miley was spotted snogging Cody over an Acai bowl after ending her whirlwind relationship with reality TV star Kaitlynn Carter, the pair don’t seem keen to hide their feelings.

From Elvis serenades, to calling her ‘baby’, the 22-year-old singer is clearly smitten with the Wrecking Ball hitmaker.

And now he’s taken it to the next level by sharing a poem that seemed meant for Miley to his Prince of Neptune amateur poet Instagram account.

He wrote: ‘the moon’s souvenir

the boulevardier

a ballerina on the promenade

we open our curtains

to the domesticated world

for a natural hour

spinning elvis records

and making love

in the soft jewelled morning’

https://www.instagram.com/p/B3UifpWhhRF/ The self-penned poem accompanies a photo of a blonde pony-tailed woman – who looks very much like Miley – gazing as if in a daydream as she leans back on a balcony, while a blue curtain billows around her. The Perfect singer has made no secret in the past of his interest in Miley, confessing in interviews that she was his ‘childhood celebrity crush’. It is all very Shakespearean really but we hope it’s not a tragedy. Meanwhile, Miley has been less smitten and more bitten – by a bout of tonsillitis. The 26-year-old shared some snaps of her looking under the weather as she recuperates: ‘Tonsillitis is a f***ing f***’. True (Instagram)

Anyone who has ever had tonsillitis would know it totally sucks, and would be even less fun if your career was making music.

Get well soon Miley!

Luckily she seems to be getting plenty of care and attention from love ‘doctor’ Cody while she is on the mend.

Ah young love.
